title: "Data Exploration plot 2"
author: "Olivia Chen"
date: "November 1, 2015"
output: html_document
---

* MNTM - Monthly temperature
* MTR - Monthly rainfall 
* TSNW - Monthly snowfall 
* Tilt - Measure of the angle between a photovoltaic array and a horizontal panel 
```{r,echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
data <- read.csv("f_DFF.csv", header = TRUE)

ggplot(data=data, aes(x=MNTM, y=Specific_Yield)) +
        geom_point(alpha=.4, size=4, color="#880011") +
        ggtitle("Production Ratio vs. Temperature")

ggplot(data=data, aes(x=MTR, y=Specific_Yield)) +
        geom_point(alpha=.4, size=4, color="#880011") +
        ggtitle("Production Ratio vs. Rain")

ggplot(data=data, aes(x=TSNW, y=Specific_Yield)) +
        geom_point(alpha=.4, size=4, color="#880011") +
        ggtitle("Production Ratio vs. snow")

ggplot(data=data, aes(x=CSI.Project.Tilt, y=Specific_Yield)) +
        geom_point(alpha=.4, size=4, color="#880011") +
        ggtitle("Production Ratio vs. Tilt")
```
